mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_ST = 'N' AND REPORT_CODE = 1

SELECT REPORTED_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME,MEMBER_EMAIL, BOARD_CONTENT, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_DATE, BC_NO, CATEGORY FROM "REPORT" JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = REPORTED_NO) JOIN "BOARD" B ON (B.MEMBER_NO = REPORTED_NO) WHERE BC_NO = BOARD_NO AND REPORT_ST = 'N' AND REPORT_CODE = 1

SELECT C.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, S.SUBSCRIBE_START, S.SUBSCRIBE_END, C.USE_MILE FROM CALCULATE C JOIN "MEMBER" M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) JOIN "SUBSCRIBE" S ON(S.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = S.MEMBER_NO
